message: I'm feeling generous, Bob. Let's get this over with quickly.
Let's split it down the middle, it's a fair deal!
Bob, you're being greedy. This is my last offer, if you reject it, we both lose money.
I'll give you a better offer, but don't expect me to go any further!
This is my final offer, Bob. If you reject it, we both lose a lot more money.
